state*"}}},"title":"LenderAccount","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"Buffer(uint128)":{"notice":"Emitted when an account saves tokens as part of its reserve"},"OffchainPayment(uint128)":{"notice":"Emitted when an account saves tokens to be consumed off-chain"},"OnchainPayment(address,uint128)":{"notice":"Emitted when an account sends tokens to an on-chain address"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"acceptAccountAdmin()":{"notice":"External permissioned function accepting an account manager role*"},"callConfigFunction(address,bytes)":{"notice":"External function enabling the call to a specified address, with a specified calldata (containing selector and execution data). The account admin is whitelisted to call this function whereas the other roles need to be approved at an address x selector level in the approvedOperationalSelectors mapping"},"claimOffChainAmount(uint128)":{"notice":"External function specifying that an amount of tokens waiting to be off-ramped by the off-ramp provider has been actually claimed and disappeared from the SC balance"},"constructor":{"notice":"Public contructor executed only during deployment, used to set up the initial configuration of the account"},"getAvailableBalance()":{"notice":"External view returning the current balance in the account not save for (i) pending to be burned off-chain"},"isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes)":{"notice":"EIP-1271 smart contract signature, only messages signed by the permissioned addresses can return magic value"},"proposeNewAccountAdmin(address)":{"notice":"External permissioned function proposing a new account manager"},"runWaterfall((bytes32,bytes)[],(bytes32,bytes)[][])":{"notice":"Function ensuring that the tokens in the account are moved in the order set out in the waterfall config. The order of the configuration enforces that a step cannot happen if the previous one did not finish, making sure for example that no jr tranche payments will ever happen before a sr tranche if the waterfall is configured that way"},"setBufferBalance(uint128)":{"notice":"External admin function to reset the current amount saved as buffer in the account"},"setOffChainPendingBalance(uint256)":{"notice":"Permissioned function to set the current amount of tokens in the Account saved to claim by an off-chain process"},"setPermissionsRegistry(address)":{"notice":"External admin function to set the state variable defining the permissions registry to use"},"updateRoleAddressStatus(bytes32,address,bool)":{"notice":"External permissioned function updating an address status"},"updateSelectorApproval(bytes32,address,bytes4,bool)":{"notice":"External function for the account admin to update the configuration permission for a specific role, enabling the access to callConfigFunction"},"updateWaterfallConfig((bytes32,bytes)[])":{"notice":"External admin function to set the waterfall configuration for the account"}},"notice":"Contract holding all the logic necessary for the Lender automated account, notably: - extending waterfall steps to include:  - committing to a tranched pool  - uncommitting from a tranched pool  - deposit into a tranched pool  - withdraw from a tranched pool  - transfer a position from a tranched params.initialAccountToken: Address of the token to use in the account
params.initialPermissionsRegistry: Address of the permissions registry to use in the account*
params.initialTranchedPool: Address of the tranched pool to interact with

params.signature: signature containing info about the signer and message

returns.returnValue: in case everything is ok (signer is LA owner and no default notice), return magic value*

params.newAccountAdmin: New address proposed to be account manager*

params.waterfallConfiguration: Array of waterfall configuration to be checked against the saved hash
params.waterfallToRun: Array of the specific steps intended to run in the waterfall: - the first dimension has the same length as the waterfall config - the second dimension contains, for each type of waterfall step configuration, an array of payments to make*

params.newBufferBalance: New amount of tokens to account as buffer in the account*

setOffChainPendingBalance(uint256).details: This function can only be called by the Account manager

params.newOffChainPendingBalance: the new mount of tokens set to wait for off-chain claim

params.newPermissionsRegistry: Address of the new permissions registry to use*

params.addressToUpdate: The address for which to update permissions
params.newStatus: The new status to set for the address*
params.role: The role that we want to update the address for

params.addressApproved: Address interacted to update permissions to
params.newStatus: New boolean status of this ROLE x ADDRESS x SELECTOR approved interaction*
params.role: Role to update the permissions to
params.selectorToUpdate: Selector in the address interacted to update permissions to

updateWaterfallConfig((bytes32,bytes)[]).details: As an optimization to save gas, the configuration is saved hashed on-chain and passed raw in the call to execute, checking that the hashed in-memory array is the same as the persisted one

params.newWaterfallConfiguration: New array to persist into state*

acceptAccountAdmin().notice: External permissioned function accepting an account manager role*

callConfigFunction(address,bytes).notice: External function enabling the call to a specified address, with a specified calldata (containing selector and execution data). The account admin is whitelisted to call this function whereas the other roles need to be approved at an address x selector level in the approvedOperationalSelectors mapping

claimOffChainAmount(uint128).notice: External function specifying that an amount of tokens waiting to be off-ramped by the off-ramp provider has been actually claimed and disappeared from the SC balance

constructor.notice: Public contructor executed only during deployment, used to set up the initial configuration of the account

getAvailableBalance().notice: External view returning the current balance in the account not save for (i) pending to be burned off-chain

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).notice: EIP-1271 smart contract signature, only messages signed by the permissioned addresses can return magic value

proposeNewAccountAdmin(address).notice: External permissioned function proposing a new account manager

runWaterfall((bytes32,bytes)[],(bytes32,.notice: Function ensuring that the tokens in the account are moved in the order set out in the waterfall config. The order of the configuration enforces that a step cannot happen if the previous one did not finish, making sure for example that no jr tranche payments will ever happen before a sr tranche if the waterfall is configured that way

setBufferBalance(uint128).notice: External admin function to reset the current amount saved as buffer in the account

setOffChainPendingBalance(uint256).notice: Permissioned function to set the current amount of tokens in the Account saved to claim by an off-chain process

setPermissionsRegistry(address).notice: External admin function to set the state variable defining the permissions registry to use

updateRoleAddressStatus(bytes32,address,.notice: External permissioned function updating an address status

updateSelectorApproval(bytes32,address,b.notice: External function for the account admin to update the configuration permission for a specific role, enabling the access to callConfigFunction

updateWaterfallConfig((bytes32,bytes)[]).notice: External admin function to set the waterfall configuration for the account
